description: Example debate configuration for balancing speed vs quality
topic: How do we balance rapid feature delivery with technical debt and code quality?
example_constraints: Budget has been reduced by 20% for next quarter
Competitor is launching similar features in 2 months
Customer satisfaction scores must not drop below 4.0

expected_rounds.round_1: Each participant states their initial position on the balance
expected_rounds.round_2: Participants respond to conflicting priorities from others
expected_rounds.round_3: Synthesis proposals that address all concerns
